Name: Kenan Deari
Description: Full Stack Web Developer leveraging over 3 years of customer service experience where communication and collaboration is a focus

roles.title: Healthcare Recruiter
roles.description: Provide support to an organization in finding the qualified candidates for vacant job positions.

roles.title: Loan Car Manager
roles.description: Managed 10 employees & ensured our fleet of 150+ vehicles were accounted for.

roles.title: Store Manager
roles.description: Worked tasks such as stacking shelfs, cashier, and cleaning to ensure our family owned corner store was ran efficiently.

Projects.Name: Druid RUI
Projects.Description: This application's purpose is to serve as a restaurant management device. The consumer will be able to utilize viewing the menu digitally. The owner of the restaurant will be able to sign-up to add & remove items from the menu. The website was designed adequately with mobile-friendliness in mind & deployed via Heroku.

Projects.Name: Burger App!
Projects.Description: This Javascript app uses express handlebars, Node, and Mysql to function. It's a responsive website that allows the user to devour hamburgers & re-order them. The user will also have the ability to add a custom burger to the database.

Projects.Name: Hungry At Home
Projects.Description: Hungry at home provides users the ability to search recipes based on what type of food they have in mind. The website enables users to search their favorite type of alcohol & drink recipes that are generated with the users' favorite alcohol. I decided to include a news section due to the outbreak of Covid-19.

Projects.Name: Team Role Generator
Projects.Description: An Employee Directory built for a manager or other employees to view non-sensitive data. Utilized a React Front-End.

Projects.Name: Budget Tracker
Projects.Description: A Budget Tracker application designed for the user to add their expenses and deposits with or without an internet connection. Progressive Web Application powered by IndexedDB.

Projects.Name: Weather Dashboard
Projects.Description: This application is a 7-day weather forecast dashboard created with JavaScript & HTML. The weather data will fetch the user's location & utilize an API to gather the local weather.
